description: This file provides service functions for a restaurant application, including fetching menu items, submitting orders, and retrieving restaurant information. It defines data types and exports asynchronous functions with mocked data as placeholders for real network calls.

methods.name: export async function fetchMenu(): Promise<MenuItem[]> { fetchMenu
methods.description: Fetches the restaurant menu list, returning an array of MenuItem objects. Currently mocked to return sample data.

methods.name: export async function submitOrder(items: { id: string; quantity: number }[]): Promise<{ orderId:/ submitOrder
methods.description: Submits an order with selected items, returning a promise that resolves to a confirmation object with an order ID and status.

methods.name: export async function fetchRestaurantInfo(): Promise<RestaurantInfo> { fetchRestaurantInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed restaurant information such as name, address, hours, and images, currently mocked with static data.

ctags.name: submitOrder
